instructions.title: Instructions

convenience.title: Convenience
convenience.item1: Open this website with your device's built-in browser or browsers like Safari, Edge, Chrome, Huawei Browser, etc., and you will be prompted to install it to your desktop.
convenience.item2: After installation, you can open it directly from the desktop without opening the browser every time. Or click the web menu and select 'Add to Home Screen'.

planning.title: Planning
planning.item1: You can select preset custom shift templates to quickly populate record information.
planning.item2: Or manually add your work time records. If the schedule indicates a rest day but you actually worked, you can add a record to account for the difference.
planning.item3: When adding a differential entry, if there is already a schedule in the calendar, it will replace the schedule to ensure the validity of the differential and working hours.

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.item1: Use the weekly calendar to add and manage schedules. Click on any date to add a new schedule task. Only one schedule task can be added per date.
scheduling.item2: Use the monthly calendar to view the entire month's schedule.

statistics.title: Statistics
statistics.item1: Select a date range to generate time statistics, with quick date selection for 'This Week' and 'This Month'.
statistics.item2: Click 'Export to Excel' to customize the Excel file name.
statistics.item3: After exporting, a time statistics report will be generated for the selected date range.

my.title: My
my.item1: Includes project introduction, data management, supports exporting all data to a JSON file for backup, or importing data from a JSON file to restore information.
my.item2: This method can also achieve data synchronization between different devices.

instructions.tip: Tip All data is securely stored locally in your browser and will not be uploaded to any server. It is recommended to regularly export data for backup.

introduction.part1: This is an efficient tool designed specifically for work time management, aimed at helping users easily track and manage work hours. The project was initially created for my wife, Sisi, as a convenient tool for calculating work hours, and has now developed into a complete time tracking system.
introduction.part2: If you have better suggestions or feedback, you can click to contact Lele.

features.title: Main Features
features.item3: Comprehensive data export and import support

support.text: If you'd like to thank the author, you can buy Sisi a cup of milk tea, or you can tip the author in the GitHub repository. You can also click to donate support for public welfare contributions.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This tool is for personal learning and reference use only. Users should bear the risks of using it themselves. This tool does not collect, store, or transmit any user data. All data is saved in the user's local browser. Users should regularly back up important data. The author is not responsible for any data loss. This tool does not provide any commercial support or technical guarantees. Please fully understand the relevant risks before use.

time_entry.title: Time Entries

custom_shift.title: Custom Shifts
custom_shift.custom_duration_help: Enter custom duration, e.g., 8h for 8 hours, 480m for 480 minutes
custom_shift.no_shifts_description: Click the button above to add your first custom shift template for quick work time recording.
custom_shift.select_shift_help: Please select a shift template to quickly populate schedule information
custom_shift.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this shift template?

time_entry.shift_name_placeholder: Selecting a shift template will auto-fill the name
time_entry.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this time entry?

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this schedule?
schedule.unique_schedule_warning: There is already a schedule for this date. Only one schedule can be added per date.
schedule.switch_to_week_view: Please switch to week view to add schedule tasks
schedule.replace_warning: There is already a schedule or entry for this date. Continuing will replace the existing content. Are you sure you want to continue?
schedule.select_shift_help: Please select a shift template to quickly populate schedule information

validation.end_time_after_start: End time must be later than start time

settings.title: Settings
settings.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all data? This action cannot be undone.
settings.import_error: Error importing data. Please check the file format.

data.title: My
data.import_error: Error importing data. Please check the file format.

export.title: Export Data
export.description: Export all data to a JSON file for backup

import.title: Import Data
import.description: Import time entry data from a JSON file, this will overwrite your current data.

danger_zone.title: Danger Zone
danger_zone.description: Clear all data from browser local storage, this action cannot be undone.

data.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all data? This action cannot be undone.

import_override.title: Confirm Override
import_override.message: Local data exists, importing will overwrite current data, continue?
